div.div: Relationship between the Julian day of the start of the season production (left panel, A) as projected with the logistic model (x axis) and the T J-A model (y axis) for the 2081–2100 period for each of the 77 simulation for the 11 regions (n = 847).
div.p: The right panel (B) shows the distribution of the displacement (delta Julian day) of the 2081–2100 vs the 1971–2000 period.
